Detailed Description

The ProviderProxyContainer is an ItemContainer that represents text and icon specified by a provider. The representation of the provider data is done by using ProviderProxyItems. The represented provider together with the columnid for text and icon has to be defined The attached provider is observed. So, if provider rows get changed, added or deleted, the number of items are adapted correspondingly and an ItemPropertiesChangeMsg is posted with the corresponding PropertyId.
